title: Engineering Innovation Award 2023
description: Received the Engineering Innovation Award for our novel suspension system design that significantly improved vehicle handling and performance.

title: Regional Racing Series 2023 - 1st Place
description: Dominated the Regional Racing Series with multiple first-place finishes, demonstrating our car's reliability and our team's operational excellence.

title: Sustainability in Engineering Award
description: Recognized for our commitment to sustainable engineering practices and innovative use of eco-friendly materials in car construction.

title: Winter Challenge 2022 - 3rd Place
description: Secured third place in the Winter Challenge, showcasing our team's ability to perform in adverse weather conditions and challenging terrain.

title: Best Technical Paper - Aerodynamics Innovation
description: Our research paper on innovative aerodynamics solutions for racing cars won the Best Technical Paper award at the International Engineering Conference.
